title: Utilizing AI-Powered Automated Essay Scoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical problem-solving skills and experience utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: An educational scenario analyzing differences between AI’s instant feedback and human evaluators’ expertise during the process of practitioners expressing mathematical thinking through essays.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three differences between AI scoring systems and human evaluators' grading results.
Learners can diagnose at least two limitations of AI feedback while writing mathematical problem-solving essays.
Learners can revise their writing strategies by comparing results from AI scoring systems and human evaluators.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
